content.title: Dear Customer
content.text:
By using Car RepAIr Estimator, you declare that you explicitly agree to our General Terms and Conditions (GTCs). This page always contains the latest version of these GTCs for you. If you have any questions, our Support Team is available at all times.

You can open and read our terms and conditions as a PDF in your browser or save them to your device.
